sense.gloss: crumbly (e.g. tofu, cheese), loose, non-sticky (e.g. rice)

sdata.j: ↑屋根↑↓やね↓には↑雨↑↓あめ↓が|ぱらぱら|↑落↑↓お↓ちていた。
sdata.e: Rain was pattering on the roof.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が|ぱらぱら|↑降↑↓ふ↓り↑出↑↓だ↓しました。
|パラパラ|と↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓り↑始↑↓はじ↓めたな。↑傘↑↓かさ↓↑持↑↓も↓ってくればよかったよ。
sdata.e: I should have brought my umbrella. Large raindrops are starting to fall.

sdata.j: ↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓によく|パラパラ|↑漫画↑↓まんが↓↑作↑↓つく↓ってたなぁ。
sdata.e: You see, I often made flip-books during class.

sdata.e: You see, I often made flip-books in class.

sdata.e: You see, I often made flip-books during lessons.
